monogr.title: The vvorlde possessed with deuils : conteinyng three dialogues. 1. Of the Deuill let loose. 2. Of blacke deuils. 3. Of white deuils. And of the commyng of Iesus Christe to iudgement, a verie necessarie and comfortable discourse for these miserable and daungerous daies
monogr.author: Viret, Pierre

div.head: To the Reader.
div.p: I Haue intituled this Booke (the world possessed with Deuilles) for twoo causes. The one, because I shewe there, how the Deuill ruleth the worlde, he guideth & gouerneth worldly and carnall men as if thei were possessed with Deuills, and giuen ouer by Gods iust iudgemēt: the other, because that in holie Scripture, the worlde is many tymes taken, for suche as are not lead by the Spirit of God, but serue the deuill as their prince and God, in stead of their true God, and acknowledge him for their Creator, Father and Sauiour.
